description: First on. Last off. A performance merino boxer with Hold 'em fit for superior support.  Mons’ high performance merino underwear provides athletic support and natural temperature regulation with bold, contemporary style. Merino Air-Con is ultra-lite and ultra breathable for year round use.
name: Mons Royale Hold `em Shorty Boxer - Mens

specs.value: Merino Air-Con 140 - 83% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon, 4% Elastane
